text: Listen, kid, Jimmy Kimmel does not find your promposal cute. ( Photo : Randy Holmes, ABC ) Jimmy Kimmel doesn't mind taking time out of his show to lecture a few teenagers. The late night host spent a portion of his Wednesday night monologue ranting about the latest trend coming out of high schools : ` ` celebrity promposals.'' One Arizona teen's campaign went viral thanks to his elaborate La La Land - themed promposal to Emma Stone, and Kylie Jenner actually attended a prom in Sacramento the other week. “ It ’ s a cute story … I know, I get it, but it ’ s also terrible and it has to be stopped, ” Kimmel said. “ Listen, kid : Emma Stone, whether she is in London or not,
